snippet: Eddie Olczyk, an N.H.L. player for 16 years, then a coach and now a broadcaster, is also a horseplayer and has owned horses.
abstract: Eddie Olczyk, an N.H.L. player for 16 years, then a coach and now a broadcaster, is also a horseplayer and has owned horses.

headline.main: For Olczyk, the Lure of Hockey and Horses
headline.print_headline: 30 Seconds With Eddie Olczyk: From Face-Off Circle to Winner’s Circle
